TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, it is not Foreign object damage

I wish to be an alliagotor that is not in a flame trenceh.

Edited August 24, 2021 by Admiral Fluffy
oh hey llok new page

Granted.You are now a green go cart. (It always a good idea to see what actually turned up on the the screen before you post it. I know I usually have to correct at least 5 typos each time I post)

I wish modern smart phones still had physical answer and end buttons.

Granted. Now they give a physical answer by sticking out a mechanical font, and they have an End button you have to press to finish any instruction.

I wish for a 50-shades-of-green display and the UOS operating system from Fallout.

Isn't that two wishes? But no matter, Granted on both counts

You get your copy of UOS and you've successfully installed it. But sometime later, thanks to Termlink, someone hacks into your system and ganks your files.

As for the 50-Shades-of-Green display, you get that too, but it is a retail display stack of books penned by E.L. James with that as the title.

Oh...my wish.

I wish to find my missing bottle of Sriracha Sauce.

Edited August 26, 2021 by Exploro
Forgot to make a wish

Alternatively granted. You realize that a Sriracha Sauce which you can't find by its smell is not a real Sriracha, so you purchase another manufacturer's bottle.

3 hours ago, Exploro said:

Isn't that two wishes?

No, it was (display + UOS) = "the server" from Fallout, so it's single.

But anyway. Now I wish for the UOS applications for that.

Granted. But your radiation counter is way up in the red zone.

I wish I knew if Kerbiloid glows in the dark?

No, but can clearly see in it without night goggles and hear weak sounds.

I wish I could fast-travel like vampires do.

Granted, you can fast travel but as soon as you touch down you instantly are set alight,

I believe I can flyyyyy

Granted. You truly believe you can fly even when you are plummeting at great speed towards the ground.

I wish to modify a tank turret in KSP to fire fireworks out it's gun barrel.

Sure, but the only available firework is the starshot-0 so you have no ammo

Soon Jeb saw your tank and he stole it for a joyride, crashing into the vab afterwards. The ksc staff wants you to pay and fix it

 

I wish my ksp install on my potato pc could stop running at 1 fps

Granted, it doesn't run at all.

I wish for more coffee.

Granted. You have to harvest five acres of coffee more till the evening, otherwise they will give you no food today.

I wish for includes and user-defined constants in the Microsoft T-SQL.

Granted. A user gets to define them but sadly that user isn't you.

I wish for firework ammo.

Granted, but you the fuse is broken so you can’t launch them (you asked for ammo not a launcher)

I wish the kraken would stop destroying my ships

Granted. Now it destroys your spaceships.

 

 

I wish Minmus was made of ice cream

Granted. Now when you land your thrusters melt the surface and you sink in. As soon as you turn off your engines it re-freezes and traps you.

I wish to try out Luna Gravity.

Granted. You are instantly transported to the Moon and you experience lunar surface gravity. However, the problem is the wish granter neglected to provide you with an EVA suit. So you only enjoy the experience for a few seconds before succumbing to exposure to vacuum.

I wish that Leitbur would make more albums.
